mapper.select: SELECT u.USERNO, u.USERID, u.USERNAME, u.HP, u.ROLE, u.STATUS, u.REGDATE, COUNT(a.ACCOUNTNO) AS accountNo, SUM(a.BALANCE) AS balance FROM USERS u JOIN ACCOUNT a ON u.USERNO = a.USERID GROUP BY u.USERNO, u.USERID, u.USERNAME, u.HP, u.ROLE, u.STATUS, u.UPDATEDAT, u.REGDATE ORDER BY u.USERNO DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS u JOIN ACCOUNT a ON u.USERNO = a.USERID
